name: Escape The Haunted Forest!
description:
One day, Tia and her friends Ashley, Zoey, and Jasmine find themselves lost in an eerie mysterious forest. They soon discover they have wandered right into a trap, set by an evil soul-stealing demon! Will our heroines escape the haunted forest alive?

CHARACTERS

Name: Tia
Age: 18
Weapon: Sword and Shield
The main protagonist. She is a brave kind young girl. She loves hunting for treasure and can be very reckless and rush into dangerous situations without thinking. Much to her friends' frustration...

 

Name: Zoey
Age: 18
Weapon: Magic Bow
Zoey is a friendly and eccentric girl. She and Tia have been best friends since childhood. She hates fighting monsters up close so she uses her bow and her spells so she can attack from a distance. She loves fishing and cooking meals for her friends.

Name: Jasmine
Age: 19
Weapon: Magic Staff
Jasmine is the daughter of a mapmaker. She longed to see the world instead of just reading about it in books, so she is traveling with her friends. Jasmine is a socially awkward mage and gets embarrassed easily.

  

Name: Ashley
Age: 19
Weapon: Two-Handed Swords
Ashley is the muscle of the group. She dropped out of Knight's Training
Academy to go adventuring with her friends. She is the 'big sister' of the group
and is protective of her friends.
